channel.title: Algorithm on Practical Machine Learning
channel.description: Recent content in Algorithm on Practical Machine Learning

item.title: Random Selection with Average
item.description: The goal of this project was to “randomly” select numbers from a predefined set, with replacement, in a way that the mean of the selected numbers would equal (or come close to) a specified number. For example, and the original motivation, was to select 100 numbers from the set: $$ X = \left\{0, 0.1, 0.25, 0.5, 0.75, 0.8, 1.0\right\} $$ so that the mean of the selected numbers was $ \approx 0.
